headline: The Best Healthcare Stocks to Buy With $5,000 in 2026 and Hold Forever
summary: All three of these healthcare giants are leaders in their niches.

headline: AI, Digital Tools and Hub Data: Could ISRG Evolve Beyond Robotics?
summary: Intuitive Surgical is positioning da Vinci 5 as a data-driven platform, using AI, software and surgical data to expand beyond robotics into insights.

headline: 2 Large-Cap Stocks with Promising Prospects and 1 We Avoid
summary: Large-cap stocks have the power to shape entire industries thanks to their size and widespread influence. With such vast footprints, however, finding new areas for growth is much harder than for smaller, more agile players.
